title: *HELP*PVP.Net Client Black Screen
body: Yesterday after update,i played league and everything was normal,but after pc restart my login (pvp.net client) is black and i cant log in or do anything.

replies.body: The black screen suggests that your network is having trouble establishing a connection to our servers.  As a first step I suggest going through the instructions in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).  This should get you fixed up!

This is probably due to your network failing to establish a stable connection with the LoL servers.

[Troubleshoot your connectivity issues.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)
